Class ChatController

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller responsible for handling chat-related operations.

      • patchChat

        public <any> patchChat(int id,
                       com.example.individual.model.Chat updatedChat)
        Partially update an existing chat by ID (e.g., update the last viewed time).
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the chat to be updated.
        updatedChat - The partial Chat object with updated fields.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing the updated Chat object if found, or a not-found response.

      • deleteChat

        public <any> deleteChat(int id)
        Delete a chat by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the chat to be deleted.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing a success message if the chat is deleted, or a not-found response.
